All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Check_Installation
    A simple ImageJ plugin for validating the 'imagingbook' installation.
    Close_Other_Images  
    Export_PDF_With_Overlay Deprecated.
    Unlock_Image
    Unlocks the currently active image.
    Zoom_Exact
    Resizes the window of the given image to fit an arbitrary, user-specified magnification factor.
    Zoom_To_Selection
    Zooms the current image, such that the given selection (ROI) fits the image window.
